title: UID_AUTH AI Origin Manifest v1
description: Open, AI Act–oriented manifest for creative works, identifying origin, rights and integrity.

@context.description: JSON-LD context for the UID_AUTH AI rights manifest.

@type.description: Type of the described resource, typically 'CreativeWork' or a more specific subtype.

uid_auth.description: Sovereign unique identifier for the work, issued by an identity authority (e.g. AUTHENTICA or a collecting society).

creator.description: Name (or pseudonym) of the creator or main author.

origin.description: Declared origin of the work: fully human, fully AI, hybrid, or unknown.

issued_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the UID_AUTH manifest was issued.

issuer.description: Entity that issues and signs the UID_AUTH manifest.

name.description: Legal or operational name of the issuing authority.

identifier.description: Optional identifier for the issuer (e.g. IPI, ISNI, internal code…).

rights.description: Rights and AI-related restrictions associated with the work.

ai_training.description: Policy regarding AI training on this work (in line with AI Act transparency and TDM rules).

tdm_opt_out.description: True if the rightsholder opts out of text-and-data mining exceptions for this work.

usage_terms.description: Optional free-text description or URL pointing to detailed usage terms.

hash.description: Cryptographic hash of the reference file or fingerprint used for integrity and evidentiary purposes.

algorithm.description: Hash algorithm used. Default recommended: sha256.

value.description: Hex-encoded digest of the file or fingerprint.

work_codes.description: Optional standard identifiers for the work.

isrc.description: ISRC for sound recordings, when available.

iswc.description: ISWC for musical works, when available.

ipi.description: IPI or similar identifier for rightsholders.

collecting_society.description: Optional information about the collecting society managing the work.

name.description: Name of the collecting society (e.g. SACEM, STIM, GEMA…).

code.description: Optional society code or internal identifier.

label.description: Optional label or publisher associated with the work.

name.description: Name of the label or publisher.

dsp.description: Optional list of DSPs where this manifest is intended to be consumed.

items.description: DSP name (e.g. Spotify, YouTube, Deezer, Apple Music…).

ai_providers.description: Optional list of AI providers expected to consume and respect this manifest.

items.description: AI provider name (e.g. OpenAI, Google, Anthropic, Stability…).

version.description: Manifest or schema version identifier, e.g. '1.0.0'.
